content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  August 14 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB' rating to Arch Capital Group Ltd.'s (ACGL) issue of non-cumulative perpetual preferred shares  series F. A full list of Fitch's existing ratings on ACGL and its subsidiaries  which were not affected by today's action  follows at the end of this release. KEY RATING DRIVERS ACGL intends to use the net proceeds to redeem some or all of its outstanding $325 million 6.75% series C

title: Fitch Rates Arch Capital's Preferred Shares 'BBB'
